E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1989
Subject: James More learns new position
James More has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Phillip Gephart
Dear Sir,
Phillip Gephart isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .181, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of James More
Dear Sir,
James More shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .211 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/5/1989
Subject: Progress of Jacob Chu
Dear Sir,
Jacob Chu has an AVG of .291 at A Marshall Thundering Herd!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1989
Subject: Progress of Samuel Bicknell
Dear Sir,
Samuel Bicknell is hitting the ball well at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .287, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Richard Cameron

Date: Thursday, 5/22/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Russell Polansky



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Lonnie Ingraham



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1989
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
David Hawkin



Date: Monday, 6/2/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,

Sincerely,
Wenceslao Martinez
